description: This is an HTML file implementing the frontend UI for a database visualizer, including styles, layout, and JavaScript logic for fetching and displaying database, table, and data information.
external_methods: fetchData (fetch API calls to server endpoints)

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the server API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets current selections, and updates UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses database entries to show/hide tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML table from JSON data and inserts into container.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates table cell HTML based on value type, supports expansion for long or object data.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Handles expanding/collapsing long or object cell content.
